name: Bathymetry
description: Bathymetry

name: Pressure
description: Pressure (depth) measured by CTD.

name: Ocean current direction
description: Direction of ocean motion measured at various depth levels

name: Ocean current speed
description: Velocity of ocean motion measured at various depth levels

name: Ocean dynamic topography (ODT)
description: Deviation of sea level from the geoid caused by ocean currents (after corrections for tides and atmospheric pressure effects)

name: Surface currents
description: Ocean Vector motion measured at or near the surface (at stated depth)

name: Dissolved inorganic carbon (DIC)
description: The cumulated concentration of inorganic carbon species (dissolved carbon dioxide, carbonic acid, bicarbonate and carbonate) in solution

name: Dissolved organic carbon
description: Concentration of dissolved organic carbon

name: Dissolved organic nitrogen
description: Concentration of dissolved organic nitrogen

name: Diffuse attenuation coefficient (DAC), turbidity
description: Indicator of water turbidity and vertical processes in the ocean, extracted from ocean colour observation

name: Chlorophyll a concentration
description: Concentration of chlorophyll-a pigment in the surface water [µg l-1]. Indicator of living phytoplankton biomass, extracted from ocean colour observation. Uncertainty is expressed in mg/m3 for a given concentration of 1 mg/m3.

name: Ocean suspended sediments concentration
description: Variable extracted from ocean colour observation. Indicative of river outflow, re-suspension or pollution of other-than-biological origin. Uncertainty expressed in g/m3 at a specific concentration (e.g., 2 g/m3).

name: Oil spill cover
description: Fraction of an ocean area polluted by hydrocarbons released from ships or off-shore platforms, accidentally or deliberately

name: Primary production
description: Production of organic matter by 'phytoplankton', microscopic plant-like photosynthetic organisms that live in the water

name: Sea surface mass flux
description: Sea surface mass flux

tags: physical properties, ocean surface heat flux
name: Ocean Surface heat flux
description: The  exchange of heat, per unit area, crossing the surface between the ocean and the atmosphere.  It consists of the turbulent (latent and sensible) and the radiative (short wave and long wave) components.

name: Sea surface height anomaly (SSHA)
description: Sea surface height anomaly

name: Total alkalinity (TA)
description: The amount of acid necessary to titrate all weak bases in seawater

name: pH
description: Negative decimal logarithm of the hydrogen ion concentration in seawater, which is a measure of acidity and alkalinity

name: SiO3= (metasilicate)
description: Concentration of dissolved metasilicate

name: O2-Ar ratio
description: Ratio of O2/Ar concentrations

name: Ocean subsurface dissolved oxygen concentration
description: Concentration of dissolved oxygen

name: Dissolved oxygen
description: Concentration of dissolved oxygen (O2) in the water column

name: Water-leaving spectral radiance
description: Upward spectral radiance from the ocean surface, i.e. amount of light leaving the ocean per unit area ,per wavelength and per solid angle

name: C2H6S (dimethylsulfide, DMS)
description: Concentration of DMS

name: Subsurface salinity
description: Salinity of seawater

name: Sea surface salinity
description: Salinity of sea water in the surface layer (upper ~1 m if observed in MW)

name: Subsurface temperature
description: Seawater temperature measured with depth (degrees celsius/kelvin)

name: Sea surface temperature
description: Temperature of the sea water at surface. The 'bulk' temperature refers to the depth of typically 2 m, the 'skin' temperature refers to within the upper 1 mm

name: Coastal sea level (tide)
description: Deviation of sea level from local references in coastal zones, caused by local currents and tides (astronomical and wind-induced)

name: Dominant wave direction
description: One feature of the ocean wave spectrum. It is the direction of the most energetic wave in the spectrum.

name: Dominant wave period
description: The period of the most energetic wave in the ocean wave spectrum

name: Significant wave height
description: Average amplitude of the highest 33 out of 100 waves

name: Wave 1D energy frequency spectrum
description: 1D variable colloquially referred to as wave spectrum. Describes the wave energy in each frequency band (e.g. 25 frequency bands) regardless of the direction of propagation.

name: Wave directional energy frequency spectrum
description: 2D variable colloquially referred to as wave spectrum. Describes the wave energy travelling in each direction and frequency band (e.g. 24 distinct azimuth sectors each 15°deg; wide, and 25 frequency bands).

name: Wind stress
description: The shear force per unit area exerted by wind blowing over the sea surface.

name: NO2- (nitrite)
description: Nitrite concentration in sea water.

name: NO3- (nitrate)
description: Nitrate concentration in sea water.

name: PO4= (phosphate)
description: Phosphate concentration in sea water.

name: Total organic phosphorus
description: Concentration of dissolved organic phosphorous

name: Sea-ice cover
description: Fraction of an ocean area where ice is present

name: Sea-ice elevation
description: Elevation of the surface of the sea-ice sheet above sea level

name: Sea-ice motion
description: Sea-ice motion

name: Sea-ice surface characteristics
description: Sea-ice surface characteristics (albedo, meltpond, dust, snow properties, temperature)

name: Sea-ice surface temperature
description: Temperature of the surface of sea-ice

name: Sea-ice thickness
description: Thickness of the ice sheet. It is related to sea-ice elevation and ice density.

name: Sea-ice type
description: Variable convolving several factors (age, roughness, density, etc.). Accuracy expressed as number of classes. Actually [ classes^-1 ] is used, so that smaller figure corresponds to better performance as usual.

name: Transmissivity
description: Measure of the light that passes through the water in relation to the incident light

name: pO2
description: partial pressure of O2

name: Conductivity
description: Conductivity measured by CTD or MicroCAT

name: Density
description: Density measured by CTD

name: Zooplankton (size and/or development stage)
description: Aggregate of animal or animal-like organisms in plankton, as protozoans

name: pCO2
description: Partial pressure of CO2

name: pCO2 air-sea flux
description: Flux of CO2 from the ocean into the atmosphere

name: Fluorescence (DOM)
description: Flurometric coloured dissolved Organic matter concentration

name: Mean dynamic topography (MDT)
description: Time-mean (over a prescribed time period) of the sea surface height above the geoid

name: Mean sea surface (MSS)
description: Time-averaged height (over a prescribed time period) of the ocean surface with respect to the reference ellipsoid

name: Sea surface height (SSH, OST)
description: Height of the sea surface with respect to the reference ellipsoid

name: Wave height
description: Average of height (trough to crest) of the waves sampled over a specified time period

name: Wave period
description: The time required for two successive wave crests to pass a fixed point, or the time for a single wave crest to travel a distance equal to the length of the wave. This is averaged over a specified period of time.

name: Directional waves
description: Waves measured in X,Y,Z directions

name: Tides
description: Periodic change of sea height caused by the gravitational forces exerted by the Moon and the Sun on the Earth

name: N2, Ar
description: Concentration of dissolved N2 and Ar

name: Zooplankton biomass and diversity
description: Biomass expressed as weight by volume; and diversity of biomass expressed as number of species per unit sample.

name: Ocean subsurface tracers
description: Concentration of trace molecules such as tritium and CFCs
